backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor for BTC-credit functionality including balances, reserve tracking, user profiles, transfers, transactions, and admin-gated queries and operations.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping implemented features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence evidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purpose and behavior of all major frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and layout.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variants, and base styling for the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router and auth gate handling identity, admin verification, initial admin credit assignment, and global layout routing.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: UI screen shown when admin access is denied, with principal display, diagnostics, copy action, and navigation options.
Loading screen for admin verification with elapsed timer, masked principal, and retry/sign-out actions after delay.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminTroubl: Shows a warning card for authenticated non-admin users, displaying their principal ID and allowing retry of the admin check.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a sign-in/sign-out button using Internet Identity, handling login state, errors, and cache resets.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their name to complete profile setup.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with navigation, user profile display, login button, and conditional admin link, including mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout wrapper including header, admin troubleshooting card, main content slot, and footer.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Transf: Renders a transaction history table with type labels, timestamps, and actions to view transfer details.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Verify: Dialog for verifying and confirming BTC transfer requests, showing status, allowing txid submission, and copying info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, state, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods such as profiles, wallets, balances, admin checks, and transactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes and custom UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app by mounting React, setting up React Query, and wrapping the app in the InternetIdentityProvider.
Displays verified admin identity info, current balance, and navigation to the admin panel.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Implements the full admin dashboard including credit transfers, BTC sends, reserve actions, and transaction viewing.
frontend/src/pages/BuyCreditsPage.tsx: Allows users to submit a BTC transaction ID to purchase credits and shows current balance.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user balance, recent transactions, and wallet info with loading states and copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Shows full transaction history with credit/debit summaries and auto-opens a transfer request if stored.
frontend/src/pages/SendBtcPage.tsx: Handles sending BTC, estimating fees, validating inputs, and showing transfer outcomes with navigation to history.
frontend/src/utils/adminStatusCache.ts: Implements per-principal admin status caching with TTL and session load tracking using localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Converts backend Send BTC errors into clear, user-friendly messages with special handling for common failure types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across navigation and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom OKLCH color system, extended theme settings, and typography/container/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, including BTC-backed credit model, architecture notes, admin flows, custodial wallet behavior, and known issues with on-chain BTC broadcasts.
